channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 调查显示，2023年中国国有开发商将主导销售和土地市场
item.description: China's property market continued to consolidate in 2023 with state-affiliated firms dominating the home sales and land acquisition market, private surveys showed, as more private firms got embroiled in the sector's deepening debt crisis.翻译:私人调查显示，随着越来越多的私营企业卷入该行业不断加深的债务危机，2023年中国房地产市场继续整合，国有企业主导了房屋销售和土地收购市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 荷兰吊销部分中国出口许可证后 ASML 股价下跌
item.description: Computer chip equipment maker ASML said the Dutch government had partially revoked an export licence for the shipment of some of its machines to China, prompting a dip in shares and a protest from Beijing on Tuesday.翻译:计算机芯片设备制造商ASML表示，荷兰政府已部分吊销其部分机器运往中国的出口许可证，导致该公司股价下跌，并于周二引发北京方面的抗议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国元旦假期房屋销量较2023年下降26%
item.description: China's average daily home sales during the three-day New Year holiday in 40 cities, based on floor area, fell 26% compared with the same period last year, a survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:周二的一项调查显示，春节三天期间，中国40个城市的日均房屋销售面积（按建筑面积计算）与去年同期相比下降了26%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 与中国关系的争议使台湾竞选活动恶化
item.description: Bitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president.翻译:关于如何处理与中国的关系并避免冲突的激烈争论正在台湾竞选活动的最后阶段占据主导地位，因为一些民意调查显示，台湾下一任总统的两位主要竞争者之间的竞争十分激烈。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 泰国和中国三月起互免公民签证
item.description: Thailand and China will permanently waive visa requirements for each other's citizens from March, Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday.翻译:泰国总理斯雷塔·塔维信 (Srettha Thavisin) 周二表示，泰国和中国将从 3 月起永久免除对方公民的签证要求。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港大亨黎智英在具有里程碑意义的安全审判中不认罪
item.description: Hong Kong tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai pleaded not guilty on Tuesday in his landmark trial, where he is accused of endangering China's national security, as prosecutors laid out details of what they said was collusion with foreign forces.翻译:香港大亨和民主倡导者黎智英周二在具有里程碑意义的审判中表示不认罪，他被指控危害中国国家安全，检方列出了他们所说的与外国势力勾结的细节。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国呼吁台湾人民推动“和平统一”
item.description: The head of China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Tuesday called on Taiwan's people to promote the process of "peaceful reunification", saying it was the common desire of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait.翻译:中国国台办负责人周二呼吁台湾人民推动“和平统一”进程，称这是两岸人民的共同愿望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国经济复苏脆弱，亚洲工厂 2023 年业绩疲软
item.description: Asia's factory activity weakened in December, portending a shaky start for the region's manufacturing powerhouses in 2024 as China's patchy economic recovery impeded a broader revival in demand.翻译:12 月份亚洲工厂活动减弱，预示着该地区制造业强国 2024 年开局不稳，因为中国经济复苏的不平衡阻碍了需求的更广泛复苏。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧洲股市创23个月新高，油价上涨
item.description: European stock markets opened higher on Tuesday as traders bet on central banks cutting rates in 2024, oil prices gained after a naval clash in the Red Sea, and Chinese stocks were weighed down by mixed economic data.翻译:欧洲股市周二开盘走高，因交易员押注各国央行将在 2024 年降息，红海海军冲突后油价上涨，而中国股市则因好坏参半的经济数据而承压。
item.author: Elizabeth Howcroft

item.title: 12月份中国工厂活动增长加速 - 财新PMI
item.description: China's factory activity expanded at a quicker pace in December due to stronger gains in output and new orders, but business confidence for 2024 remained subdued, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:周二的一项私营部门调查显示，由于产量和新订单增长强劲，中国 12 月工厂活动扩张速度加快，但 2024 年商业信心依然低迷。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024 年伊始，美元兑日元和欧元上涨，比特币突破 45,000 美元
item.description: The dollar rose on the first trading day of the year, as attention turned to U.S. jobs data and European inflation numbers this week which may provide clues on central banks' next moves, while bitcoin rallied.翻译:美元在今年第一个交易日上涨，因为本周注意力转向美国就业数据和欧洲通胀数据，这可能为央行下一步行动提供线索，而比特币则上涨。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee, Alun John

item.title: 元旦假期中国出行旅游需求旺盛
item.description: Travel in China flourished over the three-day New Year's holiday, with 135 million domestic tourist trips, up 155% from last year, while domestic tourism revenue rose to 79.73 billion yuan ($11.23 billion), data released Monday showed.翻译:周一公布的数据显示，为期三天的新年假期期间，中国旅游业蓬勃发展，国内旅游人次达到 1.35 亿人次，比去年增长 155%，国内旅游收入增至 797.3 亿元人民币（112.3 亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京批评荷兰阻止ASML向中国出口的举动
item.description: China on Tuesday urged the Netherlands to "respect market principles" a day after chip machine maker ASML said the Dutch government had revoked an export licence covering the shipment of some of its equipment to China.翻译:中国周二敦促荷兰“尊重市场原则”，此前一天，芯片机器制造商阿斯麦表示，荷兰政府已吊销其部分设备运往中国的出口许可证。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尼加拉瓜与中国自由贸易协定启动
item.description: Nicaragua and China on Monday formally started trading under a new free trade agreement, allowing the Central American country to export some 71% of its products into the largest Asian market and free of tariffs.翻译:尼加拉瓜和中国周一根据新的自由贸易协定正式开始贸易，允许这个中美洲国家向这个最大的亚洲市场出口约 71% 的产品，并且免关税。
item.author: Ismael Lopez

item.title: 中国恒大的电动汽车股份出售交易失败
item.description: A share sale plan between China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group , the electric vehicle arm of property developer China Evergrande , and U.S.-listed NWTN has lapsed, according to a Hong Kong stock exchange filing on Monday.翻译:根据周一向香港证券交易所提交的文件，房地产开发商中国恒大旗下的电动汽车子公司中国恒大新能源汽车集团与美国上市公司 NWTN 之间的股份出售计划已失效。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 调查显示，12月份中国新建住宅价格连续第四个月上涨
item.description: China's new home prices rose for the fourth straight month in December, a private survey showed on Monday, buoyed by a slew of government support measures.翻译:周一的一项私人调查显示，在一系列政府支持措施的推动下，中国12月份新房价格连续第四个月上涨。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平同美国总统拜登互致祝贺建交45周年
item.description: China's President Xi Jinping exchanged congratulations with U.S. President Joe Biden on the 45th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，中国国家主席习近平与美国总统乔·拜登就两国建交45周年互致祝贺。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 台湾总统表示与大陆的关系必须由人民的意愿决定
item.description: Peace must be based on "dignity", President Tsai Ing-wen said on Monday.翻译:蔡英文总统周一表示，和平必须建立在“尊严”的基础上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 韩联社报道，朝鲜金正恩与中国习近平互致信息，誓言建立更紧密的关系
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio.翻译:据韩国联合通讯社援引朝鲜国家电台报道，朝鲜领导人金正恩和中国国家主席习近平在周一互致的新年贺词中誓言进一步发展两国之间的合作关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国习近平称与台湾“统一”是不可避免的
item.description: China's "reunification" with Taiwan is inevitable, President Xi Jinping said in his New Year's address on Sunday, striking a stronger tone than he did last year with less than two weeks to go before the Chinese-claimed island elects a new leader.翻译:国家主席习近平在周日的新年致辞中表示，中国与台湾的“统一”是不可避免的，他的语气比去年更强硬，距离这个中国声称拥有主权的岛屿将选出新领导人还有不到两周的时间。
item.author: Reuters
